scripts.prepare: node build/prepare.js js build/main.js && node build/prepare.js test build/main.test.js
scripts.version: npm run prepare && npm run make && git add --all
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.coverage: npm run prepare && istanbul instrument js -o js-cov && mocha-phantomjs html/test/index.html?__coverage__ spec -k node_modules/mocha-phantomjs-istanbul/index.js && istanbul report && istanbul report text-summary
